documents.document: #quotes Long shots do come in and hard work, dedication and perseverance will overcome almost any prejudice and open almost any door.
The secret of success is constancy to purpose. Benjamin Disraeli
#quotes The world is more malleable than you think and it's waiting for you to hammer it into shape.
#quotes When I'm under the gun and I've got pressure on me, I don't panic. I look for the right solution, and then I go for it.
#quotes You can do anything you wish to do, have anything you wish to have, be anything you wish to be.
What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals Zig Ziglar
#quotes A happy life consists not in the absence, but in the mastery of hardships.
The superior man understands what is right; the inferior man understands what will sell. Confucius
No rose is without thorns. Afghan Proverb
High achievement always takes place in the framework of high expectation. Charles Kettering
#quotes The gem cannot be polished without friction, nor man perfected without trials.
#quotes Weve had some tough times, but weve hung in there.
Victory has a thousand fathers, but defeat is an orphan. John F. Kennedy
He who knows much does not speak much. Ethiopian Proverb
Unless youre willing to have a go, fail miserably, and have another go, success wont happen. Phillip Adams
#quotes Encourage your people to be committed to a project rather than just be involved in it.
#quotes Sometimes you just got to give yourself what you wish someone else would give you.
Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower. Steve Jobs
As Maine goes, so goes the nation.AmericanProverb
A house divided against itself cannot stand.AmericanProverb
Work harder on yourself than you do on your job. JIM ROHN
I am certainly not one of those who need to be prodded. In fact, if anything, I am the prod. Winston Churchill
Diligence brings delight. AmericanProverb
#quotes One quality of leaders and high achievers in every area seems to be a commitment to ongoing personal and professional development.
#quotes I think what we try to do is bring the news to our viewers in a very comprehensive responsible way.
Things may come to those who wait...but only the things left by those who hustle. Abe Lincoln
To climb steep hills requires slow pace at first. William Shakespeare
#quotes Remember, a real decision is measured by the fact that you've taken new action. If there's no action, you haven't truly decided
A neglected duty may returns tomorrow with seven others at its back.AmericanProverb
The most important thing about motivation is goal setting. You should always have a goal. Francie Larrieu Smith
Strength lies in differences, not in similarities. Stephen Covey
#quotes Never tell people how to do things. Tell them what to do and they will surprise you with their ingenuity. General George S. Patton
Success is not to be pursued; it is to be attracted by the person you become JIM ROHN
#quotes You've got to seize the opportunity if it is presented to you.
It's called a pen. It's like a printer, hooked straight to my brain. Dale Dauten
Tough times never last, but tough people do. Dr. Robert Schuller
#quotes You need to surround yourself with quality human beings that are intelligent and have a vision.
A fool's mouth is his destruction.AmericanProverb
Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect. - Mark Twain
#quotes I'm not panicking, and I'm not scared, I've been through the Gulf War, the Asia crisis, and the Russian crisis.
Everything should be as simple as it is, but not simpler. Albert Einstein
A man without a smiling face must not open a shop. Chinese Proverb
A disease known is half cured.AmericanProverb
To climb steep hills requires slow pace at first. William Shakespeare
#quotes I have nothing to offer but blood, toil, tears and sweat.
#quotes I'm doing everything I can to sabotage my career. It's a little thing called "fear of success".
The greatest thing in life is to keep your mind young. Henry Ford
Success comes before work only in the dictionary. Anonymous
Don't use your teeth when you can untie the knot with your fingers. Afghan Proverb
#quotes Some of us will do our jobs well and some will not, but we will be judged by only one thing. the result.
I've failed over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed. Michael Jordan
#quotes Make your product easier to buy than your competition, or you will find your customers buying from them, not you.
What I do best is share my enthusiasm. Bill Gates
An eel held by the tail is not yet caught.AmericanProverb
A dirty floor means a busy stove American Proverb
A gift is better than a promise.AmericanProverb
It is foolish for someone to remain thirsty when he is in the midst of water. Ethiopian Proverb
Bait the hook well and the fish will bite. AmericanProverb
One who doesn't appreciate the apple, won't appreciate the orchard. Afghan Proverb
Education is what remains after one has forgotten everything he learned in school. Albert Einstein
Age before beauty; pearls before swine.AmericanProverb
It is an immutable law in business that words are words, explanations are explanations, promises are promises but only performance is realit
Affectation is a greater enemy to the face than smallpox.AmericanProverb
The heart of a fool is in his mouth and the mouth of the wise man is in his heart. Ethiopian Proverb
Weakness of attitude becomes weakness of character. Albert Einstein
Champions aren't made in the gyms. Champions are made from something they have deep inside them: A desire, a dream, a vision. Muhammed Ali
#quotes I'm quite worried about the fiscal imbalances that we've got and what that might mean in terms of financial crisis ahead.
A friend won with a feather can be lost with a straw.AmericanProverb
An investment in knowledge always pays the best interest. Benjamin Franklin
Learning is not attained by chance, it must be sought for with ardor and attended to with diligence. Abigail Adams
If the heart is sad, tears will flow. Ethiopian Proverb
Only he is successful in his business who makes that pursuit which affords him the highest pleasure sustain him. Henry David Thoreau
Age and marriage tame man and beast.AmericanProverb
I think it's the mark of a great player to be confident in tough situations. John McEnroe
#quotes I was born to teach. I have always had this gift with children.
You cannot sit on the road to success, for if you do, you will get run over. Anonymous
Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity. Coach Darrel Royal
I am neither especially clever nor especially gifted. I am only very, very curious. Albert Einstein
#quotes Just by being private, the culture will change. We won't be forced to make decisions that are 90 days in relevance.
#quotes There's no good idea that can't be improved on.
#quotes Satisfaction does not come with achievement, but with effort. Full effort is full victory. Mahatma Gandhi.
#quotes I have to say I've made many mistakes, and been humbled many, many times. But you know what? It's never too late to learn.
#quotes Because I'm thinking in a broader way, I feel like I am able to make better decisions.
And in the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years. Abe Lincoln
"By working faithfully eight hours a day you may eventually get to be boss and work twelve hours a day." - Robert Frost
#quotes In business, one of the challenges is making sure that your product is the easiest to experience and complete a sale.
#quotes Public sentiment is everything. With public sentiment, nothing can fail. Without it, nothing can succeed.
#quotes Make a habit of dominating the listening and let the customer dominate the talking.
It's not the will to win, but the will to prepare to win that makes the difference. Paul "Bear" Bryant
"Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase." - Martin Luther King
Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change JIM ROHN
#quotes Positive things happen to positive people.
What one desires is always better than what one has. Ethiopian Proverb
What doesn't kill us makes us stronger Friedrich Nietzsche
#quotes We provide food that customers love, day after day after day. People just want more of it.
In order to succeed you must fail, so that you know what not to do the next time. Anthony DAngelo
High achievement always takes place in the framework of high expectation. Charles Kettering
Better buy than borrow. AmericanProverb
#quotes You need a plan to build a house. To build a life, it is even more important to have a plan or goal.
#quotes We're not in this for the fast money. Really, what we want is to be part of this industry.
